titleStmt.title: New-England vindicated from the unjust aspersions cast on the former government there, by some late considerations, pretending to shew, that the charters in those Colonies were taken from them on account of their destroying the manufactures and navigation of England.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Increase Mather by Wing.
Imperfect: Pages cropped at head with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
